titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ADMISSION METHOD CODE (MOTHER LABOUR AND DELIVERY HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) - Description

body.p: ADMISSION METHOD CODE (MOTHER LABOUR AND DELIVERY HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the same as attribute ADMISSION METHOD .
ADMISSION METHOD CODE (MOTHER LABOUR AND DELIVERY HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the method of admission to a Hospital Provider Spell for a mother for Labour and Delivery .
For specific National Code usage in different data sets, see ADMISSION METHOD .
